name: Ikigai Enablers
description: Ikigai Enablers is a Singapore-headquartered HRTech Advisory firm that helps enterprises find the right HR Tech solutions to address their business and talent challenges. The company has less than 25 employees and is dedicated to creating the greatest possible value for its clients
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: a reason for being
ShortDescription: Our mission is to enable individuals, teams and thereby enterprises to find their IKIGAI to ensure they have a sustainable growth.

Highlights.name: Academy
Highlights.description: Foster a culture of continuous growth & development with our diverse catalogue of courses & training programs. Designed to upskill HR professionals & cultivate leadership capabilities, this catalogue will empower you to drive future-proof strategic initiatives.

Highlights.name: Advisory
Highlights.description: Design, re-design & elevate your HR strategies with a wealth of knowledge & industry insights from our seasoned HR rockstars. Leverage their experience, innovative solutions & proven methods to position yourself for sustainable success.

Highlights.name: Marketplace
Highlights.description: A comprehensive hub of cutting-edge HRTech solutions, tools & resources catering to your business growth needs. Enhance your HR operations and stay ahead of the curve with our curated marketplace and drive business success.

enhanced_description: Ikigai Enablers is a Singapore-headquartered HRTech Advisory firm founded in 2012, dedicated to helping global and large enterprises find optimal HR Tech solutions to address their business and talent challenges. Beyond offering expert HR Tech advisory services, the company provides Recruitment Process Outsourcing (RPO) and one-on-one consultation sessions. It operates through three key pillars: an Academy offering courses for continuous growth and leadership development for HR professionals, an Advisory service focused on designing and elevating HR strategies with industry insights, and a Marketplace serving as a comprehensive hub for curated, cutting-edge HRTech solutions to enhance HR operations and drive business success. The firm aims to enable individuals, teams, and enterprises to achieve sustainable growth by aligning with their 'Ikigai' (reason for being).
key_use_cases: Selecting and implementing appropriate HR Tech solutions
Upskilling and developing HR professionals and leadership capabilities
Enhancing overall HR operations and strategy
Hiring top talent faster and more efficiently
competitive_advantages: Dedicated academy for HR professional development and leadership training
Combination of advisory, RPO, and training services
roi_benefits: Faster and more efficient talent acquisition
Improved HR professional capabilities and leadership
